name: 60s vintage mustard + olive tie
description:
Part of the EQUINOX collection for Fall/Winter 2013, this mustard, olive, and tan tie is handcrafted from a gorgeous 1960s vintage textile. Its classic skinny shape measures 2" at the widest and ends with a pointed fold. Features include a contrasting lining (may vary from featured image) and a custom satin tie loop.
Available in limited quantities and made to order. Please allow 3-7 days for processing before shipment. Rush orders available upon request.

name: cobalt textured tie
description:
This handcrafted tie features a brilliant cobalt blue in a thick and textured cotton with slight sheen. The skinny shape measures 2" at its widest point ends with a flat edge. This tie will add the perfect pop of color and texture to any collection. 

Only 3 left in stock!

name: vintage multicolor tie
description:
A one of a kind statement piece to mix up even the dullest of days. This necktie is made from vintage multi-colored fabric lush with texture and detail. All ties are cut from 1 piece of the fabric, leaving each completely unique and one of a kind.

Features include a leather tie loop and modern straight cut at the end of the tie. Two inches at the widest point and approximately 57" long. For care, use steam or a medium iron with steam under a pressing cloth to loosen wrinkles.

name: quilted foliage tie
description:
This handcrafted tie is made from a light cotton with quilted details and a gorgeous foliage print. The mustards, browns, and greens are the perfect addition to any Fall or Winter ensemble. The classic skinny shape measures 2" at the widest point and ends with a pointed fold. 

Only 2 left in stock!

name: heathered gray wool tie
description:
A classic wool tie never goes out of style. This heathered gray wool tie is no exception. Features include 100% wool fabric and a leather tie loop.

The skinny shape measures 2" at the widest point and approximately 57" long. For care, use steam or medium iron with steam under a pressing cloth to loosen wrinkles.

This tie is made to order so please allow up to 5 days for processing before the tie is shipped.

name: gold stripe tie
description:
This luscious gold tie is made from a bold cotton blend with just a hint of shine. The classic diagonal stripe melds perfectly with the pop of a bright gold texture.

Width measures 2” at the widest point and ends with a triangle fold. Features include a black leather tie loop.

This tie is made to order so please allow up to 5 days for processing before the tie is shipped.

name: vintage green wool tie
description:
This eye catching necktie features a vintage wool blend in green with hints of yellow. Pair it with a crisp gray or navy shirt for the perfect ensemble to take you well through early Spring.

The classic shape measures 2" at the widest point and approximately 57" long. Other features include a custom satin tie loop.

This tie is made to order so please allow up to 5 days for processing before the tie is shipped.

Only 1 tie left in stock!

name: DIY or Die Tote
description:
DIY or die. What else can we say?

Screen printed by hand on cotton tote bag.

name: red cotton stripes tie
description:
This soft and classic striped tie is handcrafted from woven cotton. The red and white stripes are accented by the woven texture of the cotton.

It's classic skinny shape measures 2" at the widest and ends with a pointed fold. Features also include a leather tie loop.

This tie is made to order so please allow up to 5 days for processing before the tie is shipped.

name: ivory embroidered tie
description: This gorgeous ivory tie is handcrafted from an embroidered cotton, lush with texture. This modern twist on the classic tie is the unexpected addition to your fall and winter collection. It's classic skinny shape measures 2" at the widest and ends with a pointed fold.

name: blue cotton stripes tie
description: This soft and classic striped tie is handcrafted from woven cotton. The blue and white stripes are accented by the woven texture of the cotton. It's classic skinny shape measures 2" at the widest and ends with a pointed fold.

name: classic gray wool tie
description:
A well-made wool tie is the perfect addition to every man's winter collection. This handcrafted tie is made of 100% wool in the classic skinny shape. It measures 2" at the widest point and finishes with a triangle end. 

Only 1 left in stock!
